badges.title: Python
badges.description: Python is more than a language, it's access to a mature and active community of development.

badges.title: Octave
badges.description: Octave and Matlab provide an efficient environment for rapid prototyping of algorithms and statistical methods.

badges.title: Scipy
badges.description: Scipy along with Numpy and other related software packages provide great toolbelts for data analysis and processing.

badges.title: Sklearn
badges.description: Sklearn has become the standard python toolkit for building interesting and complicated machine learning systems.

badges.title: Pandas
badges.description: Pandas is a great system for connecting data sources to statistical analysis systems.

badges.title: NLTK
badges.description: NLTK gives access to a wide array of text processing systems like tokenizers, part of speech taggers, parsers, classifiers.
